CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fly deeper quickly or go slowly backwards.
CONTROLS.NAME: fly_in_out

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add in beams, and control their brightness with beam glow.
CONTROLS.NAME: beams_on

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: A few thin beams, or many undulating beams.
CONTROLS.NAME: many_beams

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Controls how brightly the beams glow.
CONTROLS.NAME: beam_glow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Rhythmic contractions of the cavern lining...
CONTROLS.NAME: undulating

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Send one smooth pulse outward from the camera.
CONTROLS.NAME: wave_pulse

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: A light that chases down the corridor in time with the music.
CONTROLS.NAME: light_chaser

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash the lights according to the music, instead of constant lights.
CONTROLS.NAME: lights_react

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Stuff gets colorful! Definitely experiment with walls texture while this is on.
CONTROLS.NAME: colorful

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add spiral bumps to the surface of the corridor.
CONTROLS.NAME: walls_texture
